info.description: 蓝鲸权限中心后台服务 API 文档
info.title: IAM API

get.description: list policies of ids or between min-max ids
get max policy id by condition

post.description: eval all the policies queried by conditions: system/subject/action and resources[required]

post.summary: batch auth by actions/批量鉴权接口

parameters.description: the batch auth by actions request
parameters.name: body

post.summary: batch auth by resources/批量鉴权接口

parameters.description: the batch auth by resources request
parameters.name: body

post.description: query the policy by conditions: system/subject/action and resources[optional]

post.summary: batch query by actions/批量查询策略

parameters.description: the batch query by action request
parameters.name: body

post.description: query the policy by conditions: system/subject/action and resources[optional]
post.summary: policy query by ext resources/批量第三方依赖策略查询

get.summary: query subjects/获取有权限的用户列表

get.description: get a subject's groups, include the inherit groups from department

parameters.description: get subject's inherit groups from it's departments
parameters.name: inherit

put.summary: update template policy/更新模板授权的策略

post.summary: Create and delete template policy/创建删除模板授权的策略

delete.summary: delete template policy/删除模板授权的策略
Batch delete policies/删除用户策略

post.summary: Alter policies/变更用户自定义申请策略

get.description: /healthz to make sure the server is health
/ping to get response from iam, make sure the server is alive
/version to get the version of iam
